attributes.action: Create a 'Teen Ticket' pilot scheme for buses in Preston.
attributes.additional_details: This petition is designed for people to express their support for reducing bus fares for young people aged 16-17. It proposes that, in the Preston area, a 'Teen-Ticket' system be piloted on Stagecoach, Preston Bus, and John Fishwick and Sons. This would involve a reduced fare, higher than that of a child, but lower than that of an adult, for the specified age range.
